synopsis.text: As semble under the banner of the fledgling entertainment agency, 315 Production, a diverse group of ambitious men swap their established careers for a shot at stardom as male idols. Among them are a seasoned lawyer, a skilled surgeon, and a veteran pilot, all united by a shared dream: to claim the coveted title of top idol. As they navigate the unfamiliar terrain of the entertainment industry, they strive to master their new roles and reach the pinnacle of success. Based on the Idom@ster SideM app, this anime brings the captivating tales of these aspiring idols to the forefront.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
